Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to veterans receiving information on benefits
Summary: Provides that individuals requesting and obtaining a veteran notation on such individual's driver's license or non-driver identification card shall be advised that the department of veterans' services and local veterans' service agencies provide assistance to veterans regarding benefits under federal and state law.
LawCode: Amd ยง7, Veterans' Services L; amd ยง508, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to veterans receiving information on benefits
